TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EntityDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader implements class System.Data.IDataRecord, class System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord
Public Class EntityDataReader Inherits DbDataReader Implements IExtendedDataRecord
public ref class EntityDataReader : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader, System::Data::IExtendedDataRecord
type EntityDataReader = class inherit DbDataReader interface IExtendedDataRecord interface IDataRecord

summary.span: 從資料來源讀取順向的資料流。

span.span: Reads a forward-only stream of rows from a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結合 類別 (Class) 和 介面的功能。Combines the functionality of the class and the interface. 沒有公用的建構函式。An has no public constructor. 它只能透過其中一種取得`EntityCommand.ExecuteReader`方法多載。It can only be obtained through one of the `EntityCommand.ExecuteReader` method overloads. SQL Server 會將來自預存程序的輸出參數置於結果資料流的結尾，在所有結果集的後面。SQL Server puts output parameters from stored procedures at the end of the result stream, after all the result sets. 因此，如果要取得輸出參數值，應用程式必須使用所有結果集中的所有記錄。Therefore, to get output parameter values, an application must consume all the records in all the result sets. 如果應用程式關閉 (這樣也會關閉 )，輸出參數可能會無法填入。If the application closes the (which would also close the ), output parameters might not be populated. 不會以隱含方式使用結果集讓輸出參數變成可以使用。 does not implicitly consume result sets to make output parameters available. 因此，請特別留意下列情況：Therefore, note the following: - 只會在 被隱含呼叫時，才會呼叫 。 calls the only when is explicitly called. 如果例外狀況，則會擲回會將它包裝在（或衍生的例外狀況）。If throws an exception, the will wrap it in an (or a derived exception). - 只會關閉 ，而不使用任何暫止的記錄或結果集。 only closes the , without consuming any pending records or result sets. - 只會處置 ，而不使用任何暫止的記錄或結果集。 only disposes of the , without consuming any pending records or result sets. 如需程式碼範例，請參閱[使用 EntityClient](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5)。For code examples, see [Working with EntityClient](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dec4728c-8dff-4e30-abe0-0f78fb5d5af5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks SQL Server 會將來自預存程序的輸出參數置於結果資料流的結尾，在所有結果集的後面。SQL Server puts output parameters from stored procedures at the end of the result stream, after all the result sets. 因此，如果要取得輸出參數值，應用程式必須使用所有結果集中的所有記錄。Therefore, to get output parameter values, an application must consume all the records in all the result sets. 如果應用程式關閉 (這樣也會關閉 )，輸出參數可能會無法填入。If the application closes the (which would also close the ), output parameters might not be populated. 不會以隱含方式使用結果集讓輸出參數變成可以使用。 does not implicitly consume result sets to make output parameters available. 因此，請特別留意下列情況：Therefore, note the following: - 只會在 被隱含呼叫時，才會呼叫 。 calls the only when is explicitly called. 如果例外狀況，則會擲回會將它包裝在（或衍生的例外狀況）。If throws an exception, will wrap it in (or a derived exception). - 只會關閉 ，而不使用任何暫止的記錄或結果集。 only closes the , without consuming any pending records or result sets. - 只會處置 ，而不使用任何暫止的記錄或結果集。 only disposes of the , without consuming any pending records or result sets.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool NextResult() cil managed
Public Overrides Function NextResult () As Boolean

summary.span: 在讀取陳述式批次的結果時，會將讀取器向前移到下一個結果。

span.span: Advances the reader to the next result when reading the results of a batch of statements.

returns.span: 如果有其他的結果集 (Result Set)，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if there are more result sets; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您在提交批次給資料提供者時，處理傳回的多個結果集。This method allows you to process multiple result sets returned when a batch is submitted to the data provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Read() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Read () As Boolean

summary.span: 將讀取器向前移到結果集中的下一個資料錄。

span.span: Advances the reader to the next record in a result set.

returns.span: 如果有多個資料列，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if there are more rows; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料讀取器的預設位置是在第一個資料錄之前。The default position of a data reader is before the first record. 因此，您必須呼叫`Read`以開始存取資料。Therefore, you must call `Read` to begin accessing data.

span.span: Working with EntityClient

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property RecordsAffected As Integer
public: virtual property int RecordsAffected { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得因執行 SQL 陳述式所變更、插入或刪除的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.

value.span: 已變更、插入或刪除的資料列數。

span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.

value.span: 如果是 SELECT 陳述式會傳回 -1；如果沒有影響資料列或陳述式失敗，則傳回 0。

span.span: Returns -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected or the statement failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `RecordsAffected`屬性才會設定讀取所有資料列，而且您關閉`DataReader`。The `RecordsAffected` property is not set until all rows are read and you close the `DataReader`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property VisibleFieldCount As Integer
public: virtual property int VisibleFieldCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得 中沒有隱藏的欄位數。

span.span: Gets the number of fields in the that are not hidden.
The number of fields that are not hidden.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個值會用來判斷 中有多少欄位是可見的。This value is used to determine how many fields in the are visible. 例如，部分主索引鍵上的 SELECT 會傳回索引鍵的剩餘部分做為隱藏欄位。For example, a SELECT on a partial primary key returns the remaining parts of the key as hidden fields. 隱藏欄位永遠會附加在可見欄位之後。The hidden fields are always appended behind the visible fields.
